note.p: Birth: Pictou, Nova Scotia, Canada (02 February 1849)
Education: McGill College, Montreal; Royal School of Mines, London. DSc

Career: Returned to Canada (1872); botanist and geologist to the commission for drawing the boundary between Canada and the United States; collected natural history specimens; worked on the Canadian Geological Survey, making expeditions to the North West and British Columbia; Assistant Director, Geological Survey of Canada (1883); member of the Bering Sea Commision (1891); Director (1895); died of bronchitis
